Title: Dreamsurge Investigation
Description:
The Emerald Dream bleeding over into Azeroth is unprecedented, $n. We need to understand exactly what is being affected by this phenomenon if we're to prepare ourselves for what is to come.

Perhaps we can even turn this to our advantage.

Head out into the affected area and see what you can learn. Bring back anything of interest and we will see what can be done.

Objectives.Text: World quests in the Dreamsurge completed.
Rare elite empowered by the Dreamsurge slain.
Contribute Dreamsurge Coalescence towards an effect.
